channel.title: Starter-Theme on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in Starter-Theme on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: Our plans for the Starter Theme
item.description: With PrestaShop 1.7, theme designers have the choice to either start their work from scratch, rework the Classic theme, or build upon the foundations laid by the Starter Theme. Based on feedback from our community, we want to improve the Starter Theme into something that fits them best.

item.title: Starter Theme: fresh news from the front #3
item.description: It’s been a while since we gave you any news about the StarterTheme. So, let’s sum up what happened since Starter Theme: Fresh News From The Front #2.

item.title: Starter Theme: fresh news from the front #2
item.description: We already have more exciting news about the StarterTheme.

item.title: Starter Theme: fresh news from the front
item.description: It’s been a month since PrestaShop announced a new Starter Theme project.

item.title: We're building a Starter Theme for PrestaShop 1.7.0.0
item.description: If you’ve ever tried to create a PrestaShop theme from scratch, you might have noticed it requires quite a large skillset: not only must you know HTML, CSS and Smarty, but you also need to be very familiar with the inner workings of PrestaShop itself. There is a lot of business logic going on in the templates, it is hard to tell apart classes that are used for styling from classes that are used by JavaScript-powered features, etc.
